column9: 2015 at avera st. lukes hospital in aberdeen. a memorial service will be 10:30a. m.
column12: 2015 at the united church of faulkton with pastor bill hoffman presiding. inurnment will follow in the miranda cemetery. a prayer service will be 7:00p. m.
